    B

    Board - Class in application.model.board
    Represents the 10×20 Tetris playing field.
    Board() - Constructor for class application.model.board.Board
    Creates a new empty board with the default dimensions from Config.
    Board(int, int) - Constructor for class application.model.board.Board
    Creates a new empty board with the specified dimensions.
    BOARD_COLS - Static variable in class application.util.Config
    Number of columns in the Tetris board.
    BOARD_ROWS - Static variable in class application.util.Config
    Number of rows in the Tetris board.
    Boss - Class in application.model.boss
    Base class for all bosses in the game.
    Boss(int) - Constructor for class application.model.boss.Boss
    Initializes the base boss with the given max health.
    BOSS_ANIMATION_INTERVAL_MS - Static variable in class application.util.Config
    Boss sprite animation toggle interval in milliseconds.
    BossFactory - Class in application.model.boss
    Creates the appropriate Boss subclass for each stage number (1–10).
    BossRenderer - Class in application.view
    Displays boss information including name, sprite, health bar, and stage.
    BossRenderer() - Constructor for class application.view.BossRenderer
    Constructs the boss renderer panel with styled labels, sprite view, and health bar.
    bossType - Variable in class application.model.boss.Boss
    The type identifier for this boss.
    BossType - Enum Class in application.model.boss
    Identifies the different boss variants in the game.
